org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.network

Class WifiDirectPersistentGroupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.network.WifiStartStoppable
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.internal.network.WifiDirectPersistentGroupManager

  • public class WifiDirectPersistentGroupManager
extends WifiStartStoppable
    WifiDirectPersistentGroupManager is a utility class for discovering and manipulating WifiDirect persistent groups

        Asynchronously enumerates the extant persistent Wifi Direct groups. Aka 'Remembered Groups'

      • getPersistentGroups

        public java.util.Collection<WifiP2pGroup> getPersistentGroups()
        Synchronously enumerates the extant persistent Wifi Direct groups. Must NOT be called on the callback looper thread. If an error or interrupt occurs, an empty list is returned.
